item.title: Testimonial 1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Home / Testimonial

Client’s Testimonials

“Dedication to adopting the latest technological solutions enables us to understand the needs of entrepreneurs and corporations whose core business is – technology.”

item.title: Team Details--pages
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Home / Team Details

Alina Stives

Founder & CEO

SEO Analysis

SEO Audit

Optimization

We’ll ensure that you focus on the opportunities that maximize competitive advantage and strengthen the connection
between operations and strategy. From the back office we can help you to transform your operations.

Our service offerings extend beyond roof repairs and
installation to rooftop snow
removal, proactive the roof maintenance plans, and siding repair and replacement – not to mention reroofing and restora
tion. We do our best.

Facebook-f Twitter Dribbble Behance

Contact info

Alina’s Info details:

  • 757 Third Avenue, 20th
    Floor
    New York, NY 10017
  • info@gmail.com
    info@yahoo.com

Get in touch

[contact-form-7 id="4251" title="Team Contact"]

Home / Under construction

Our website is under Construction

Our website is under construction, but we are ready to go! Special surprise
for our subscribers only[contact-form-7 id="4507" title="Coming Soon Newsletter"]

Sign up now to get early notification of our lauch date!

item.title: Privacy Policy--pages
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Home / Privacy Policy

Our Privacy-Policy

Ximsa Consultants Limited & Agencynomics Limited* Privacy Notice.

HOW WE USE INFORMATION.

This notice is to explain why we collect information at Asri & Agencynomics and what we do with that information.

We are a data controller for information about our clients, partners, staff and contractors which
enables us to fulfil our obligations to you.

We use this information to help digital marketing agencies, our clients, our partners, our suppliers and our staff/contractors, to keep them informed and to ensure that they are able to access our
support and tools in more effective ways.

From time to time, we also use other organisations to process this data (for example Eventbrite,
Hubspot, Mighty Networks, Google) under strict and clear terms that abide by our obligations within the law.

Using these organisations (eg Mighty Networks and Eventbrite) you will usually be directly
submitting information to these organisations under their data protection regulations (links included below).

The categories of information that we may collect include:

  • Personal information (eg names, addresses, gender etc)
  • Medical and dietary information (for events)
  • Company information (such as address/registration number/other publicly available information)
  • Bank details/credit card information

Why we collect and use this information:

  • to fulfil our obligations
  • to communicate
  • to fulfil our services
  • to make and receive payments.

SHARING INFORMATION :

We do not share information with anyone without consent unless the law and our policies allow us to do so.

REQUESTING ACCESS TO YOUR PERSONAL DATA:

Under data protection legislation you have the right to request access to information that we hold about you. To make a request for your personal information please contact us at hello@asri.us.

You also have the right to:

  • object to processing of personal data that is likely to cause, or is causing, damage or distress
  • prevent processing for the purpose of direct marketing
  • in certain circumstances, have inaccurate personal data rectified, blocked, erased or destroyed; and - claim compensation for damages caused by a breach of the Data Protection regulations.
  • If you would like to discuss anything in this privacy notice, please contact our Data Protection.

*Agencynomics is a subsidiary of Asri Consultants Limited

Contact info

Alina’s Info details:

  • 757 Third Avenue, 20th
    Floor
    New York, NY 10017
  • info@gmail.com
    info@yahoo.com

Get in touch

[contact-form-7 id="4251" title="Team Contact"]

item.content:encoded:
Home / Why Choose Us

We are the Best Company in the City

Unlimited Color Option

Seamlessly aggregate pandemic for leadership through functionalized & information technology.

Easily Managable

Seamlessly aggregate pandemic for leadership through functionalized & information technology.

Powerful Idea

Seamlessly aggregate pandemic for leadership through functionalized & information technology.

Why Choose our company?

Where good conversationsv
become great experience.

Customers want to connect any time, any place. Meet them where they are with the Suite, which provides sophisticated, seamless support that flows across channels.

About Us Why Choose our company?

There’s more where that
came from.

What are we doing for business?

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor.

What is the procedure to get started?

How much profit we can earn?

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.

We have some easy steps
to complete projects.

Our clients turn to Asri’s specialised divisions for personalised service and access
to the most qualified talent for their recruitment.

item.title: portfolio single
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Project Description

He continues to take heat from Americans over rising gas prices, leading his own party to introduce a proposal to temporarily suspend the federal gas tax in order to help blunt the financial pain of surging prices at the pump. Other costs, including energy bills, are also having an impact on Americans.

News reached out to the White House in an effort to see what factors have contributed to Biden's sinking average polling numbers but did not receive an immediate resp. Don't believe for one minute that Democrats proposed.

Hire us Hire us

  • Customer

    Rob’s Firm

  • Customer

    Facebook Marketing,
    Marketing

  • Value:

    1,500 USD

  • Date:

    Nov 23, 2021

item.title: portfolio single 04
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
• Customer

    Rob’s Firm

  • Customer

    Facebook Marketing,
    Marketing

  • Value:

    1,500 USD

  • Date:

    Nov 23, 2021

Rob’s Firm Consulting

He continues to take heat from Americans over rising gas prices, leading his own party to introduce a proposal to temporarily suspend the federal gas tax in order to help blunt the financial pain of surging prices at the pump. Other costs, including energy bills, are also having an impact on Americans.

Prev Project Prev Project

item.title: portfolio single 05
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Project details

  • Name:Rob’s house
  • Date:24th March 2020
  • Author:Marilin De Aragon
  • Tag:Cleaning, Plumbing

Value: $ 125

Rob’s Firm Consulting

He continues to take heat from Americans over rising gas prices, leading his own party to introduce a proposal to temporarily suspend the federal gas tax in order to help blunt the financial pain of surging prices at the pump. Other costs, including energy bills, are also having an impact on Americans.

  • The housekeepers we hired are professionals who take pride in doing excellent work and in exceeding expectations.
  • We carefully screen all of our cleaners you can rest assured that your home would receive the absolute highest quality of service providing.
  • Your time is precious, and we understand that cleaning is really just one more item on your to-do list.

‘’Tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna alias quat enim veniam quis nostru exercitation ullamco laboris nis aliquip.’’

John Doe

Managing Director Prev Project Prev Project

Our awesome features

Our features will help
to improve busines

Sales teams use PandaDoc to improve deal workflow, insights, and speed while delivering an amazing buying experience. Get your documents out the door fast to keep deals.

Trusted by over 12,000 businesses and 18,000 users.

Let’s make the world more productive, together.

item.content:encoded:
Business Consulting

Our success as consultants will depend on the essential rightness of the advice.

We’ll ensure that you focus on the opportunities that maximize competitive advantage and strengthen the connection between operations and strategy. From the back office we can help you to transform your operations. Chicago’s premier roofing contractor delivering the care and attention you’d expect from a startup with the resources and experience you expect of the national brands.

You can communicate with us without any problem

We’ll ensure that you focus on the opportunities that maximize competitive advantage and strengthen the connection between operations and strategy. From the back office we can help you to transform your operations. Chicago’s premier roofing contractor delivering the care.

Flat Roof Company has, since our very first day in operation, been one of the best options in the region for commercial, residential, and industrial flat roof repair and installation.We’ll ensure that you focus on the opportunities that maximize competitive advantage and strengthen the connection between
operations and strategy. From the back office we can help you to transform your operations. Chicago’s premier roofing contractor delivering the care.

item.title: Team Details
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Alina Stives

Founder & CEO

SEO Analysis

SEO Audit

Optimization

We’ll ensure that you focus on the opportunities that maximize competitive advantage and strengthen the connection between operations and strategy. From the back office we can help you to transform your operations. Our service offerings extend beyond roof repairs and installation to rooftop snow removal, proactive the roof maintenance plans, and siding repair and replacement – not to mention reroofing and restora tion. We do our best. Facebook-f Twitter Dribbble Behance

Contact info

Alina’s Info details:

  • 757 Third Avenue, 20th Floor New York, NY 10017
  • info@gmail.com info@yahoo.com

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Our Privacy-Policy

Ximsa Consultants Limited & Agencynomics Limited* Privacy Notice.

HOW WE USE INFORMATION.

This notice is to explain why we collect information at Asri & Agencynomics and what we do with that information. We are a data controller for information about our clients, partners, staff and contractors which enables us to fulfil our obligations to you. We use this information to help digital marketing agencies, our clients, our partners, our suppliers and our staff/contractors, to keep them informed and to ensure that they are able to access our support and tools in more effective ways. From time to time, we also use other organisations to process this data (for example Eventbrite, Hubspot, Mighty Networks, Google) under strict and clear terms that abide by our obligations within the law. Using these organisations (eg Mighty Networks and Eventbrite) you will usually be directly submitting information to these organisations under their data protection regulations (links included below). The categories of information that we may collect include:
  • Personal information (eg names, addresses, gender etc)
  • Medical and dietary information (for events)
  • Company information (such as address/registration number/other publicly available information)
  • Bank details/credit card information
Why we collect and use this information:
  • to fulfil our obligations
  • to communicate
  • to fulfil our services
  • to make and receive payments.

SHARING INFORMATION :

We do not share information with anyone without consent unless the law and our policies allow us to do so.

REQUESTING ACCESS TO YOUR PERSONAL DATA:

Under data protection legislation you have the right to request access to information that we hold about you. To make a request for your personal information please contact us at hello@asri.us. You also have the right to:
  • object to processing of personal data that is likely to cause, or is causing, damage or distress
  • prevent processing for the purpose of direct marketing
  • in certain circumstances, have inaccurate personal data rectified, blocked, erased or destroyed; and - claim compensation for damages caused by a breach of the Data Protection regulations.
  • If you would like to discuss anything in this privacy notice, please contact our Data Protection.
*Agencynomics is a subsidiary of Asri Consultants Limited

Contact info

Alina’s Info details:

  • 757 Third Avenue, 20th Floor New York, NY 10017
  • info@gmail.com info@yahoo.com

Get in touch

INFORMATION.","header_size":"h4","title_color":"#080808","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Inter","typography_font_weight":"700","_margin":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"25","left":"0","isLinked":false},"typography_font_size_mobile":{"unit":"px","size":18,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"heading"},{"id":"3376d80a","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

This notice is to explain why we collect information at Asri & Agencynomics and what we do with that information.

","text_color":"#666666","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Rubik","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":17,"sizes":[]},"typography_font_weight":"400","typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":28,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"71f0605f","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

We are a data controller for information about our clients, partners, staff and contractors which
enables us to fulfil our obligations to you.

","text_color":"#666666","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Rubik","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":17,"sizes":[]},"typography_font_weight":"400","typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":28,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"68ada26","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

We use this information to help digital marketing agencies, our clients, our partners, our suppliers and our staff/contractors, to keep them informed and to ensure that they are able to access our
support and tools in more effective ways.

","text_color":"#666666","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Rubik","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":17,"sizes":[]},"typography_font_weight":"400","typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":28,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"36284f04","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

From time to time, we also use other organisations to process this data (for example Eventbrite,
Hubspot, Mighty Networks, Google) under strict and clear terms that abide by our obligations within the law.

","text_color":"#666666","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Rubik","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":17,"sizes":[]},"typography_font_weight":"400","typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":28,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"60c8b3d7","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Using these organisations (eg Mighty Networks and Eventbrite) you will usually be directly
submitting information to these organisations under their data protection regulations (links included below).

","text_color":"#666666","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Rubik","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":17,"sizes":[]},"typography_font_weight":"400","typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":28,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"45b3936","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

The categories of information that we may collect include:

","text_color":"#666666","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Rubik","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":17,"sizes":[]},"typography_font_weight":"400","typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":28,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"11c6879","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"
  • Personal information (eg names, addresses, gender etc)
  • Medical and dietary information (for events)
  • Company information (such as address/registration number/other publicly available information)
  • Bank details/credit card information
","text_color":"#666666","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Rubik","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":17,"sizes":[]},"typography_font_weight":"400","typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":28,"sizes":[]},"_margin":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"15","left":"0","isLinked":false}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"6054f0a7","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Why we collect and use this information:

","text_color":"#666666","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Rubik","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":17,"sizes":[]},"typography_font_weight":"400","typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":28,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"2aae9b8a","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"
  • to fulfil our obligations
  • to communicate
  • to fulfil our services
  • to make and receive payments.
","text_color":"#666666","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Rubik","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":17,"sizes":[]},"typography_font_weight":"400","typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":28,"sizes":[]},"_margin":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"15","left":"0","isLinked":false}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"e96388d","elType":"widget","settings":{"title":"SHARING INFORMATION : ","header_size":"h4","title_color":"#080808","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Inter","typography_font_weight":"700","_margin":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"25","left":"0","isLinked":false},"typography_font_size_mobile":{"unit":"px","size":18,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"heading"},{"id":"531d009f","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

We do not share information with anyone without consent unless the law and our policies allow us to do so.

","text_color":"#666666","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Rubik","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":17,"sizes":[]},"typography_font_weight":"400","typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":28,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"6196341d","elType":"widget","settings":{"title":"REQUESTING ACCESS TO YOUR PERSONAL DATA:","header_size":"h4","title_color":"#080808","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Inter","typography_font_weight":"700","_margin":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"25","left":"0","isLinked":false},"typography_font_size_mobile":{"unit":"px","size":20,"sizes":[]},"typography_line_height_mobile":{"unit":"em","size":1.5,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"heading"},{"id":"30dfc439","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Under data protection legislation you have the right to request access to information that we hold about you. To make a request for your personal information please contact us at hello@asri.us.

","text_color":"#666666","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Rubik","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":17,"sizes":[]},"typography_font_weight":"400","typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":28,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"30fc4551","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

You also have the right to:

","text_color":"#666666","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Rubik","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":17,"sizes":[]},"typography_font_weight":"400","typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":28,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"2c5ce04","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"
  • object to processing of personal data that is likely to cause, or is causing, damage or distress
  • prevent processing for the purpose of direct marketing
  • in certain circumstances, have inaccurate personal data rectified, blocked, erased or destroyed; and - claim compensation for damages caused by a breach of the Data Protection regulations.
  • If you would like to discuss anything in this privacy notice, please contact our Data Protection.
","text_color":"#666666","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Rubik","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":17,"sizes":[]},"typography_font_weight":"400","typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":28,"sizes":[]},"_margin":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"15","left":"0","isLinked":false}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"13ff916b","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

*Agencynomics is a subsidiary of Asri Consultants Limited

","text_color":"#666666","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Rubik","typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":17,"sizes":[]},"typography_font_weight":"400","typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":28,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true},{"id":"545c579f","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":33,"_inline_size":15,"_inline_size_tablet":10},"elements":[],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"8179b26","elType":"section","settings":{"layout":"full_width"},"elements":[{"id":"6657f72c","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"5ff4237a","elType":"widget","settings":{"title":"Contact item.title: Why Choose Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
We are the Best Company in the City

Unlimited Color Option

Seamlessly aggregate pandemic for leadership through functionalized & information technology.

Easily Managable

Seamlessly aggregate pandemic for leadership through functionalized & information technology.

Powerful Idea

Seamlessly aggregate pandemic for leadership through functionalized & information technology. Why Choose our company?

Where good conversationsv become great experience.

Customers want to connect any time, any place. Meet them where they are with the Suite, which provides sophisticated, seamless support that flows across channels. About Us Why Choose our company?

There’s more where that came from.

What are we doing for business? Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor. What is the procedure to get started? We have some easy steps to complete projects.

item.title: Portfolio Single
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Firm Consulting

He continues to take heat from Americans over rising gas prices, leading his own party to introduce a proposal to temporarily suspend the federal gas tax in order to help blunt the financial pain of surging prices at the pump. Other costs, including energy bills, are also having an impact on Americans.

News reached out to the White House in an effort to see what factors have contributed to Biden's sinking average polling numbers but did not receive an immediate resp. Don't believe for one minute that Democrats proposed.

item.title: Portfolio Single 05
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Project details

  • Name:Rob’s house
  • Date:24th March 2020
  • Author:Marilin De Aragon
  • Tag:Cleaning, Plumbing

Value: $ 125

Firm Consulting

He continues to take heat from Americans over rising gas prices, leading his own party to introduce a proposal to temporarily suspend the federal gas tax in order to help blunt the financial pain of surging prices at the pump. Other costs, including energy bills, are also having an impact on Americans.

  • The housekeepers we hired are professionals who take pride in doing excellent work and in exceeding expectations.
  • We carefully screen all of our cleaners you can rest assured that your home would receive the absolute highest quality of service providing.
  • Your time is precious, and we understand that cleaning is really just one more item on your to-do list.

‘’Tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna alias quat enim veniam quis nostru exercitation ullamco laboris nis aliquip.’’

John Doe

Managing Director Prev Project Prev Project

  • Your time is precious, and we understand that cleaning is really just one more item on your to-do list.<\/li><\/ul>"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true},{"id":"2ef802c","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":58,"margin":{"unit":"%","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"8","isLinked":false},"margin_tablet":{"unit":"px","top":"30","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":false},"_inline_size_tablet":100},"elements":[{"id":"7be0fe4","elType":"widget","settings":{"avatar":{"id":2301,"url":"https:\/\/themexriver.com\/appilo-theme\/main\/wp-content\/uploads\/sites\/2\/2022\/12\/avatar.jpg","alt":"","source":"library"},"quote":{"id":2687,"url":"https:\/\/themexriver.com\/appilo-theme\/main\/wp-content\/uploads\/sites\/2\/2022\/12\/quote.png","alt":"","source":"library"},"content":"\u2018\u2019Tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna alias quat enim veniam quis nostru exercitation ullamco laboris nis aliquip.\u2019\u2019","name":"John Doe","designation":" Managing Director ","padding":{"unit":"px","top":"40","right":"40","bottom":"40","left":"40","isLinked":true},"name_typography_typography":"custom","name_typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":20,"sizes":[]},"name_typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":30,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"themex-review"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true},{"id":"6587b4b3","elType":"widget","settings":{"l_text":"Prev Project","r_text":"Prev Project","nav_typography_typography":"custom","nav_typography_font_family":"Rubik","_margin":{"unit":"px","top":"40","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":false}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"themex-addons-portfolio-nav"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Loft Office With Vintage Decor For Creative Working
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: It’s no secret that the digital industry is booming. From exciting startups to global brands, companies are reaching out to digital agencie, responding to the new possibilitie available. However, the in come is fast becoming overcrowded, heaving with agencies offering similar services — on the most surface, at least.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to Appilo Multipurpose WordPress Theme. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.
